document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Leptogorgia Milne Edwards & Haime, 1857 (Coelenterata: Octocorallia: Gorgoniidae) in the eastern Pacific

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the genus Leptogorgia Milne Edwards & Haime, 1857 (Coelenterata: Octocorallia: Gorgoniidae) in the eastern Pacific

subSubSection.paragraph:
Leptogorgia cuspidata Verrill, 1865: 186
; 1868b: 403; 1869b: 421; Nutting 1910: 5; Bielschowsky 1918: 29; 1929: 132; Kükenthal 1919: 772; 1924: 335.

Material examined .
Lectotype (here designated): MCZ 4061 ( MCZ 263 ), Cape San Lucas, Baja California , no depth given, donor: Smithsonian Institution, J . Xantus, 1869–1861
.
Paralectotypes : MCZ 4058 ( MCZ 349 ) (2), dry, Acapulco , no depth given, D
.
V . Vanbrunt , 1863
;
YPM 954 , 1709 , Baja California Sur , Cape San Lucas , no depth given, J. Xantus , 1869–1861
;
USNM 1676 ( 2 specimens ), dry, Baja California Sur , Cape San Lucas , no depth given, J. Xantus , 1869–1861
.
